meanings.definition: A person who lives in solitude, especially for religious reasons.
meanings.sent1: The hermits in the mountains spent their days in quiet prayer.
meanings.sent2: Many hermits choose to live alone in search of spiritual enlightenment.
meanings.sent3: The hermits decided to have a silent dance party in their secluded cabin.
meanings.sent4: The hermits' hearts were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The image of the hermits meditating under the starry sky was truly serene.

meanings.sent3: The cat decided to hermits under the bed during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent4: The old tree hermits in the middle of the meadow, away from the bustling city.
